function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of reliable and constant ict connection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inflexible indoor space during filtration may lead to the spread of waterborne diseases.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of measurement for water usage reduction may lead to inaccurate assessment of
